roadmap.title: Strengthen Foundational Knowledge
roadmap.description: Deepen your understanding of core AI concepts, including mathematics (linear algebra, calculus, probability, statistics), machine learning algorithms (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning), and deep learning architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers).
resources: Textbooks (e.g., "Deep Learning" by Goodfellow et al., "Reinforcement Learning" by Sutton and Barto)

roadmap.title: Specialize in a Research Area
roadmap.description: Focus on a specific domain within AI research, such as NLP, Computer Vision, Generative AI, or Reinforcement Learning.  Align this with your interests (LLMs, NLP, RAG, Generative AI, Time Series Forecasting) and explore current research trends.
resources: Read research papers in your chosen area
Follow leading researchers and labs on social media and academic platforms

roadmap.title: Build a Strong Research Portfolio
roadmap.description: Expand upon your existing projects and contribute to open-source projects.  Start with smaller, well-defined projects and gradually increase complexity. Document your work clearly and concisely, emphasizing your contributions and results.
resources: Contribute to research papers (start with workshops or less prestigious venues)

roadmap.title: Gain Research Experience
roadmap.description: Seek research internships at universities, research labs, or companies with dedicated AI research teams. This provides valuable practical experience and mentorship.
resources: Company research internships (e.g., Google AI Residency, Facebook AI Research)

roadmap.title: Pursue Advanced Education (Optional but Recommended)
roadmap.description: A Master's or PhD degree in Computer Science or a related field significantly strengthens your research credentials and opens doors to more advanced research roles.
resources: Identify universities with strong AI research programs
Prepare for graduate admissions tests (GRE, TOEFL)

roadmap.title: Network and Collaborate
roadmap.description: Actively engage with the AI research community. Attend conferences, present your work, and collaborate with other researchers.

roadmap.title: Publish Your Research
roadmap.description: Disseminate your findings by publishing papers in reputable conferences and journals. This establishes your credibility as a researcher and contributes to the advancement of the field.
